body:
> Should a `dnn` provider be added? I guess there are two packages that provide that, but perhaps they are not compatible.
> 
> * onednn
> * intel-oneapi-dnn

@vpirogov: Are onednn product build and open source build compatible? Can an application that builds against one also build against the other?

_Originally posted by @rscohn2 in https://github.com/spack/spack/issues/22202#issuecomment-802333169_
title: Make a onednn provider
